/usr/bin/c++  -g   CMakeFiles/visualiseGeometry.dir/main.cpp.o  -o visualiseGeometry -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib /usr/local/lib/libpangolin.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLU.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGL.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLEW.so -lwayland-egl -lwayland-client -lwayland-cursor -lxkbcommon -lEGL /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libSM.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libICE.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libX11.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libXext.so -lrt -lpthread /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libdc1394.so /usr/lib/libOpenNI.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpng.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libz.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libjpeg.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libtiff.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libIlmImf.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/liblz4.so
